explanation: The loop bounds used range(int(N/7)), which truncates and omits any final partial group when N is not a multiple of 7. Replacing that line with range((N+6)//7) ensures we iterate over all 7-element groups and include the last partial group (if any). Only that single line was changed.
fixed_code:
N = int(input())
l = list(map(int,input().split()))
lis = []
d = []
b = 0
for j in range((N+6)//7):
  for k in l[7*b:7*(b+1)]:
      lis.append(k)
  d.append(sum(lis))
  lis.clear()
  b += 1
print(*d)
